West_Allis.WGLB: WGLB (1560 AM) is a gospel music radio station licensed to Elm Grove, Wisconsin and serving the Milwaukee metropolitan area. The station is owned by the estate of Joel Kinlow, and licensed to his children Joe Kinlow and Alesia Kinlow-Glosson, the co-personal representatives of the estate. Joel Kinlow used to own television station WJJA in Racine and FM radio station WGLB-FM in Port Washington, Wisconsin.
